Title: Requires consultation with tribal nations as part of the state budget process
Summary: Directs the division of the budget to consult tribal nations, relevant state agencies, and other stakeholders regarding budget proposals that would impact such tribal nations.
LawCode: Add ยง22-d, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to requiring consultation with tribal nations as part of the state budget process
